content: melt the ice - mini hat knit in the round by kathy pereira de almeida i used mercerized cotton amigurumi yarn by circulo size us 3 3 25 mm double pointed needles not sized so you may use yarn / needles you like co 24 sts to one needle *** see note below for tips on knitting in the round with double-pointed needles work in the round r1-6 1x1 rib r7-9 knit r10 ssk k8 k2tog ssk k8 k2tog 20 r11 ssk k6 k2tog ssk k6 k2tog 16 r12 ssk k4 k2tog ssk k4 k2tog 10 r13 ssk k2 k2tog ssk k2 k2tog 8 r14 ssk k2tog ssk k2tog 4 r15 ssk ssk 2 work 5-row of i-cord and finish off by making a tassel sew a pin onto the back to wear ***divide stitches onto 2 double pointed needles then introduce 3rd dp needle as you begin to work in 1x1 rib the goal is to place 8 stitches onto each needle and work with the 4th needle abbreviations r round co cast on ssk slip one knitwise slip one purlwise then knit the 2-slipped stitches together k2tog knit two together
